title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7303.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7303.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the following definitions shall apply
to the terms listed below: (a) Facility shall mean a specialized secure juvenile detention facilities for
older youth. (b) Construction or
renovation shall mean: (1)
all acquisition
or designation of a physical plant not originally operated as a
facility; (2)
all new facility
construction; or
(3)
all
renovations, additions, or substantial alterations to an existing facility
setting which involves physical structure, security, or major fixed equipment
changes, other than replacement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7303.1

Adopted

New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
